originalText.text: This is a such a wonderful vet clinic! I brought my cat for her yearly check up. They have a separate cat room so it was low stress for her. They do minimal handling to also lower stress. The vet administered shots without my cat really noticing, I was impressed. The vaccination prices are also reasonable. Overall the whole staff was warm and helpful. They do followup check ins and answer any questions. 10/10 will continue to bring my cat here!

They do followup check ins and answer any questions. 10/10 will continue to bring my cat here!

originalText.text: I love Riverside Veterinary Care. Their fear-free practice and expertise in animal behavior has been immeasurably helpful with my üêà ReRe. Dr. Ratcliffe has been so helpful and patient in working with ReRe and me on ReRe's fear of the vet. She used to need anesthesia to go through a simple visit. Yesterday we had a visit and although there were a few meows of displeasure, ReRe was calm throughout her checkup (and received lots of treats). Front office staff is kind and efficient and I love the new office environment!

originalText.text: First visit to this clinic. Good first impression. Clean and bright. The front desk staff were polite and pleasant. Dr. Ratcliff is a good communicator. She asks questions, listens, and explains. The vet tech was also very pleasant and skilled. My dog can be grouchy, so I appreciated their patience.

She asks questions, listens, and explains. The vet tech was also very pleasant and skilled. My dog can be grouchy, so I appreciated their patience.

originalText.text: If I could give a million star rating I would.  Dr. East saw our boy Todd first last week for what we hoped would be a routine check up, upon exam she immediately noted a large abdominal mass and recommended gold standard veterinary care and referrals.  She handled our boy with kindness and compassion as well as discussing all of our options thoroughly and answering all of our questions. Yesterday we saw Dr. Ratcliff who also treated our sweet boy with the same dignity, respect, and high quality veterinary care. Completing the first steps of testing for his cancer diagnosis, and carefully selecting the medications he needed to be comfortable. She called us immediately upon receiving test results which unfortunately resulted in Todd‚Äôs final veterinary visit at the ER after hours. We were told where to go, what may happen, and Todd‚Äôs records were immediately sent out. This vet clinic is efficient, compassionate, and how every vet clinic should be modeled after from the technician‚Äôs fear-free approach, the doctor‚Äôs high quality of medicine, and the office staff‚Äôs efficiency. The office is clean and well thought out to be ‚Äúfear free certified‚Äù which is just another sign of how important your animal‚Äôs experience is to this hospital‚Äôs staff. Because of this clinic, Todd did not suffer or feel any pain in his final days, and we are forever thankful for that.  People like this vet hospital make the world a better place. Thank you.

text.text: If I could give a million star rating I would.  Dr. East saw our boy Todd first last week for what we hoped would be a routine check up, upon exam she immediately noted a large abdominal mass and recommended gold standard veterinary care and referrals.  She handled our boy with kindness and compassion as well as discussing all of our options thoroughly and answering all of our questions. Yesterday we saw Dr. Ratcliff who also treated our sweet boy with the same dignity, respect, and high quality veterinary care. Completing the first steps of testing for his cancer diagnosis, and carefully selecting the medications he needed to be comfortable. She called us immediately upon receiving test results which unfortunately resulted in Todd‚Äôs final veterinary visit at the ER after hours. We were told where to go, what may happen, and Todd‚Äôs records were immediately sent out. This vet clinic is efficient, compassionate, and how every vet clinic should be modeled after from the technician‚Äôs fear-free approach, the doctor‚Äôs high quality of medicine, and the office staff‚Äôs efficiency. The office is clean and well thought out to be ‚Äúfear free certified‚Äù which is just another sign of how important your animal‚Äôs experience is to this hospital‚Äôs staff. Because of this clinic, Todd did not suffer or feel any pain in his final days, and we are forever thankful for that.  People like this vet hospital make the world a better place. Thank you.
